data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Hongliang, Liang, Hongbin (2018): Revision of genus Pericalus from China, with descriptions of four new species (Carabidae, Lebiini, Pericalina). ZooKeys 758: 19-54, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.758.24169, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.758.24169
